name: Issue Finder
description: Chrome extension to find github issues
content_security_policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' https://api.github.com/graphql https://api.github.com/graphql 'unsafe-eval'; connect-src https://api.github.com/graphql https://api.github.com/graphql; style-src * 'unsafe-inline' 'self' blob:; img-src 'self' data:;
